A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The WORST Star Wars movie EVER made.  0/10 

SPOILER FREE

When i came out of the theater i felt bad for the first time after watching a movie\, i felt betrayed\, insulted and disgusted\, i couldn't believe that i have spent money to get trolled by Disney.
This "movie" looks written and directed by a 9 years old for a 9 years old.
Plot holes EVERYWHERE\, childish and pathetic humor all the time\, that has no place in a Star Wars movie or in any war zone scenario\, one-dimentional\, uninteresting\, undeveloped characters and main villains.
A Luke Skywalker COMPLETELY out of character that makes nonsensical decisions.
Force powers and shields functionality (and other stuff) in this movie are contradictory from one scene to another (a complete JOKE).
F***ing useless and pathetic space penguins with the only purpose to milk money from the audience with toys.
And this is just the TIP of iceberg of this offensive movie that has the ONLY PURPOSE of grab the most money possible from the fans with merchandise and sequels.

DO NOT PAY TO WATCH THIS MOVIE.
